content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: charcoal
inventory=[{"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "baked_potato", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 47, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "melon_seeds", "quantity": 26, "index": 26}]
thought: To craft a charcoal I need to smelt the stripped_jungle_wood at slot 20 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
act: smelt from slot 20 to slot 11 with quantity 1
